thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Mr COLE
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Mr COLE

author: Mr COLE
title: Mr COLE
text: All the stars from me to TomTop. I recently purchased the Hubsan H501S.... The transaction went smoothly and the delievery was on time. I also purchased a spare battery for the H501S and that arrived on time too! I am 100% satisfied with my products and the service provided by this First Class company! Thank you very much TomTop. I will be back to purchase more things from you very soon! Mike (Waterford Ireland)
